sourcesContent:
Add New Product

Success! Product is Added Successfully.
Product name is required
Product name is too short
Product name should start with an alphabet
Description is required
Description is too short
Description should contain alphabets only
Quantity is required
Quantity should be between 1 and 50
Image is required
Price is required
Discount is required
Discount should be between 1 and 95
Specification is required
